net.sf.sprockets.net

Class Uris

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.net.Uris

  • public class Uris
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with Uris.

      Append the cursor's _ID value to the URI.

      Append a notify_change query parameter to the URI.

        public static Uri groupByHavingLimit(Uri uri,
                     String groupBy,
                     String having,
                     String limit)
        Append group_by, having, and limit query parameters to the URI. Any null or empty parameters are skipped.

      • mailto

        public static Uri mailto(List<String> to,
         List<String> cc,
         List<String> bcc,
         String subject,
         String body)
        Get a mailto Uri with the headers. Any null or empty parameters are skipped. The subject and body will be encoded.
